sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:refBib: Microhomology based CRISPR tagging tools for protein tracking, purification, and depletion. Lin DW, Chung BP, Huang JW, Wang X, Huang L, Kaiser P. J Biol Chem. 2019 May 28. pii: RA119.008422. doi: 10.1074/jbc.RA119.008422. 10.1074/jbc.RA119.008422 PubMed 31138654
sbol:ComponentDefinition.dcterms:description: Provides the repair template with PP2Ac microhomology on each end for PP2Ac N-ter FAID tagging.

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: lac operator
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: lac operator
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: The lac repressor binds to the lac operator to inhibit transcription in E. coli. This inhibition can be relieved by adding lactose or isopropyl-beta-D-thiogalactopyranoside (IPTG).

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: BGH-rev
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: BGH-rev
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: Bovine growth hormone terminator, reverse primer. Also called BGH reverse

sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:entrezGene:
PPP2CA
(a.k.a. NEDLBA, PP2Ac, PP2CA, PP2Calpha, RP-C)

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: Puro-R
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: Puromycin resistance gene, reverse primer. Also called puro-variant-R
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: Puro-R

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:product: 2A peptide from Thosea asigna virus capsid protein
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: T2A
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: Eukaryotic ribosomes fail to insert a peptide bond between the Gly and Pro residues, yielding separate polypeptides.
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: T2A

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: AmpR
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: AmpR
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: confers resistance to ampicillin, carbenicillin, and related antibiotics

sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:academicNonprofitTerms: UBMTA Ancillary Agreement for Plasmids Containing FP Materials

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: Eukaryotic ribosomes fail to insert a peptide bond between the Gly and Pro residues, yielding separate polypeptides.
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: P2A
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: P2A

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: vertebrate consensus sequence for strong initiation of translation (Kozak, 1987)
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: vertebrate consensus sequence for strong initiation of translation (Kozak, 1987)
In lacZ gene. Also called M13-F20 or M13 (-21) Forward
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: M13 Forward
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: M13 Forward

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: pBABE 3'
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: pBABE 3'
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: SV40 enhancer, reverse primer for pBABE vectors

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: EXFP-R
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: For distinguishing EGFP variants, reverse primer
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: EXFP-R

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: FLAG
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: FLAG
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:product: FLAG(R) epitope tag, followed by an enterokinase cleavage site

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: M13 fwd
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: M13 fwd
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: common sequencing primer, one of multiple similar variants

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:product: minimal degron from the auxin-responsive IAA17 protein of Arabidopsis thaliana (Kubota et al., 2013)
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: acts as an auxin-inducible degron (AID) in the presence of TIR1
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: mini-AID
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: mini-AID

sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:refMethod: pN-PITCh-FAID was a gift from Peter Kaiser (Addgene plasmid # 127885 ; http://n2t.net/addgene:127885 ; RRID:Addgene_127885)
sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:purpose: Provides the repair template with PP2Ac microhomology on each end for PP2Ac N-ter FAID tagging
